attributes.action: Undertake to never declare war on any country except in direct self-defence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are currently involved in two wars one in Iraq one in Afghanistan. Both or these wars are illegal as neither of these countries could attack the UK. We must stop killing the innocent of these countries and start to look for peaceful ways to solve world problems. There is no future in war only darkness.
